Title: Creates a temporary state commission to study and investigate the effects of closures of long term care facilities
Summary: Creates a temporary state commission to study and investigate the effects of closures of long term care facilities on the residents of such facilities and their families.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the elder law, in relation to creating a temporary state commission to study and investigate the effects of closures of long term care facilities on the residents of such facilities and their families; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
